Requirement: A weapon with the Loading trait.

You focus your eyes on your target from behind your readied weapon, zeroing in on your opponent's weak points and calculating the distance, gravity, and air resistance of your soon-to-hit next shot.

Pros

Reliable Aim

  • You do not have disadvantage on attacks at any range, or from being @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}.
Stabilized Shot
  • You do not exit Loading Stance while @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}.
  • While in at least half cover that you can brace your weapon on, or else while @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}:
    • Your attacks gain a +3 to hit.
    • Your damage die increases by 1 size.
  • Adjacent allies of equal or larger size can use a Reaction to assist you by bracing your weapon using their shoulders, arms, or otherwise to give you these benefits outside of cover.
Snipe
  • While at least 30ft from the target:
    • Your attacks gain a +3 to hit.
    • Your damage die increases by 1 size
    • The natural roll required for a critical hit is reduced by 1. For example, if a Natural 20 is a critical hit, you can roll a Critical Hit with a Natural 19.

Cons

Slow Loader

  • Unless @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}, reloading your weapon on any turn where you were in this stance requires a Minor Action instead of a Non-Action.
Malfunction
  • On a critically failed weapon attack, Strength (Save) check, or Dexterity (Save) check, your weapon gets jammed, becoming unusable. You can attempt unjam the weapon as an action.
Danger Close
  • You have disadavantage to target creatures within 15ft of you.
